actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require any nursing home, which provides services under any State program approved under such title, to submit to the State agency administering such program an annual report on the costs incurred in the operation of such nursing home.

summary.text: Requires, under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act, any nursing home which provides services under any State program approved under such title to submit to the State agency administering such program an annual report on the costs incurred in the operation of such nursing home.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require any nursing home, which provides services under any State program approved under such title, to submit to the State agency administering such program an annual report on the costs incurred in the operation of such nursing home.
